issue.title: Executing hx_connect() from standalone computer running MATLAB R2014b API causes MATLAB to crash

content.raw:
I've tried, but am unable to reproduce this problem.  Two ideas:

* ~~We're building with R2014b, and you report that you're using R2014a.  I don't know whether they're meant to be compatible.~~  (You are also using R2014b.)
* We [recently fixed](#!/osrf/haptix-comm/issue/10/matlab-crashes-on-exit) a hang/crash that was consistently happening on exit from MATLAB; perhaps you're seeing at runtime instead of exit.

Regarding the second point, we're preparing new releases now and will let you know when to update your installations on Linux on Windows.
content.html:
I've tried, but am unable to reproduce this problem. Two ideas:

  • We're building with R2014b, and you report that you're using R2014a. I don't know whether they're meant to be compatible. (You are also using R2014b.)
  • We recently fixed a hang/crash that was consistently happening on exit from MATLAB; perhaps you're seeing at runtime instead of exit.

Regarding the second point, we're preparing new releases now and will let you know when to update your installations on Linux on Windows.
